mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.yhje AS "yhje", a.lx AS "lx", a.storeid AS "store.id", cs.name AS "store.name", a.ddid AS "ddid.id", ck.ddbh AS "ddid.ddbh", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remaks AS "remaks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN c_rkckddinfo ck ON ck.id=a.ddid LEFT JOIN c_store cs ON cs.id=a.storeid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_discount( id, yhje, lx, storeid, ddid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remaks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{yhje}, #{lx}, #{store.id}, #{ddid.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remaks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE f_discount SET yhje = #{yhje}, lx = #{lx}, storeid = #{store.id}, ddid = #{ddid.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remaks = #{remaks} WHERE id = #{id}
